comments:
WTP 0.7 RC5

1. start WTP on a clean workspace
2. create a new dynamic web project
3. create a new jsp (does not matter if you select a new jsp template or just 
have a blank jsp)
4. prompt for content assist
5. you get the below exception
6. once you close and reopen the file, everything works fine

Note I've only been able to reproduce this consistently when I start with a 
fresh workspace and it only seems to happen when i create a new jsp (not html, 
xml) and you can create the new jsp either through the new jsp wizard or just 
new file w/ jsp extension.
